command.MISSING_ARGUMENTS: Missing required Arguments. Please try again.

meeting.MEETING_NO_PERMISSION: You're not permitted to edit this meeting.

creation.CREATION_TOO_MANY_MEETINGS_DESCRIPTION: You cannot create another Meeting. You have to delete a Meeting in order to create a new one.
creation.CREATION_NOT_PERMITTED_DESCRIPTION: You're not permitted to create a new Meeting.
creation.CREATION_INVALID_DATE: You've provided an invalid date! The date must be somewhere between now and 2 years in advance. Please try again.
creation.CREATION_INVALID_TIMEZONE: `%s` is an invalid timezone. A list of timezones can be found [here](%s)
creation.CREATION_INVALID_LANGUAGE:
You've provided an invalid/not supported language: `%s`.
Supported languages are: `%s`
creation.CREATION_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION:
All set! Your Meeting's ID is `%s`! I've automatically created a log and voice channel for your meeting. Once the meeting begins, every participant can join the meeting.
You can always edit your meeting using `/manage-meeting edit`!
creation.CREATION_FAILED: There was an error while creating the Meeting. Please try again.

command.MEETING_NOT_FOUND: You don't have a Meeting with ID `%s`. Use `/meeting list` to list your Meetings
command.MEETING_PARTICIPANT_ALREADY_ADDED: %s was already added to this meeting.
command.MEETING_PARTICIPANT_NOT_FOUND: %s was not added to the meeting.
command.MEETING_ADMIN_NOT_A_PARTICIPANT: %s is not a participant of this meeting.
command.CANCEL_MEETING_DESCRIPTION: The Meeting with ID `%s` has been discarded.
command.MEETING_DISCARD_FAILED_DESCRIPTION: An ongoing Meeting cannot be discard. Please use `/meeting end` instead.
command.ADMINS_REMOVE_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: %s is not an admin of `%s` anymore.
command.MEETING_END_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: The Meeting has been ended successfully.
command.MEETING_END_FAILED_DESCRIPTION: Cannot end Meeting. Please use `/manage-meeting discard` instead.

log.LOG_PARTICIPANT_ADDED: %s has been added to this Meeting.
log.LOG_PARTICIPANT_REMOVED: %s has been removed from this Meeting.
log.LOG_START_DESCRIPTION: The meeting is starting in %s now.
log.LOG_MEETING_STARTED:
The Meeting has been started! %s
To end the Meeting, either the Owner or an Administrator have to execute the `/meeting end` command

edit.EDIT_INVALID_DATE: You've provided an invalid date! The date must be somewhere between now and 2 years in advance. Please try again.
edit.EDIT_INVALID_TIMEZONE: `%s` is an invalid timezone. A list of timezones can be found [here](%s)
edit.EDIT_INVALID_LANGUAGE:
You've provided an invalid/not supported language: `%s`.
Supported languages are: `%s`
edit.EDIT_FAILED: There was an error while editing the Meeting. Please try again.

faq.FAQ_MEETING_START_FIELD_DESCRIPTION: This Meeting will start at exactly <t:%s:R>.
faq.FAQ_MEETING_EDIT_FIELD_HEADER: How do I change the Meeting's Title/Description/Language/...?
faq.FAQ_MEETING_EDIT_FIELD_DESCRIPTION: The Meeting Owner and all Meeting Administrators are able to always edit the Meeting using `/manage-meeting edit`.
faq.FAQ_MEETING_ADMIN_FIELD_DESCRIPTION: Meeting Administrators can be added via the `/manage-meeting add-admin` command by the Meeting's Owner and are able to manually add or remove participants, edit the Meeting, or just start/end it manually.
